name: Kayak
description: Stable One-man kayaks with space for packing

name: Earlybird-tour
description: early bird is a guided morning tour across Lake Gerdsken into the river that leads to the lake Lilla Färgen (Approx. 6.5km). The tour can be booked for private parties or when Surfboden arranges open tours

name: Pedal boat
pris: 1 person: SEK 100 / hour, 2-3 people: SEK 150 / hour, 4 people SEK 200 / hour
description: Take a ride in one of our lovely pedal boats - there are several different sizes depending on the number of people in your group

name: Party raft
description: Rent the 40sqm large raft with company up to 20 people Rented until 22.00 (23.00 on weekends)

name: Private lesson SUP
description: Private lessons are primarily aimed at those who have never tried but also those who have tested before who want better paddling techniques and other tips. The course is situational and individualized.

name: SUP
pris: 1 hour · SEK 150 each, SEK 100 youth 8-18 years
description: Take a trip across Lake Gredsken on a SUP

name: Sup - All day
description: Bring your SUP(s) on your own adventure. The SUPs are packed in bags with fins, pump and paddle as well as repair kits.
